name: Aboshan's Desire
oracle_text:
Enchant creature

name: Acceptable Losses
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card at random.
Acceptable Losses deals 5 damage to target creature.

name: Aether Burst
oracle_text: Return up to X target creatures to their owners' hands, where X is one plus the number of cards named Aether Burst in all graveyards as you cast this spell.
flavor_text: As fleeting as a cephalid's promise.

name: Afflict
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: When one of the Patriarch's champions displeased him, he would only shake his finger. That was enough.

name: Anarchist
oracle_text: When Anarchist enters the battlefield, you may return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Those who will not follow are doomed to lead.

name: Angelic Wall
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
flavor_text:
"The Ancestor protects us in ways we can't begin to comprehend."
—Mystic elder

name: Auramancer
oracle_text: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Beauty stirs the memory like a sweet perfume excites the air.

name: Aven Cloudchaser
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Aven Cloudchaser enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text:
"At the Reapportionment, Eagle begged to be human. The Ancestor granted half that prayer."
—Nomad myth

name: Aven Fisher
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Aven Fisher dies, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: The same spears that catch their food today will defend their homes tomorrow.

name: Aven Flock
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{W}: Aven Flock gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Just as each added feather steadies the wing, so does the flock grow stronger with each new member.

name: Aven Windreader
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{1}{U}: Target player reveals the top card of their library.
flavor_text: "The tiniest ripple tells a story ten fathoms deep."

name: Barbarian Lunatic
oracle_text: {2}{R}, Sacrifice Barbarian Lunatic: It deals 2 damage to target creature.
flavor_text:
"I once saw a single barbarian charge a band of twenty nomads. I've seen some crazy ones, too."
—Nomad sentry

name: Blazing Salvo
oracle_text: Blazing Salvo deals 3 damage to target creature unless that creature's controller has Blazing Salvo deal 5 damage to them.
flavor_text: Barbarians equate courage with the ability to endure pain.

name: Bog Wreckage
oracle_text:
Bog Wreckage enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
{T}, Sacrifice Bog Wreckage: Add one mana of any color.

name: Cabal Inquisitor
oracle_text: Threshold — {1}{B}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Target player discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery and only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

name: Careful Study
oracle_text: Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
flavor_text: Books are like crops—they must be thinned for best yield.

name: Cartographer
oracle_text: When Cartographer enters the battlefield, you may return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "Finding the way once is luck. Finding the way twice takes a good map."

name: Cease-Fire
oracle_text:
Target player can't cast creature spells this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: When the crimson fades from the magical embers, a final wisp of smoke will rise. Soon after, hostilities will begin anew.

name: Cephalid Looter
oracle_text: {T}: Target player draws a card, then discards a card.
flavor_text: "Amazing, isn't it, what humans will throw away when they're drowning?"

name: Cephalid Scout
oracle_text:
Flying
{2}{U}, Sacrifice a land: Draw a card.
flavor_text: The more they survey the dreadful dry expanses, the more the cephalids thirst to tame them.

name: Chainflinger
oracle_text:
{1}{R}, {T}: Chainflinger deals 1 damage to any target.
Threshold — {2}{R}, {T}: Chainflinger deals 2 damage to any target. Activate only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

name: Confessor

name: Crypt Creeper

name: Dedicated Martyr

flavor_text: It despises humans and squirrels and beasts and dwarves and cephalids . . . well, it despises just about everything.

Unanswered prayers are themselves answers.

Haste

oracle_text:

name: Woodland Druid
